sqlMap.sql: select b.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID, b.ADVC_RPT_JOB_NO, b.YEAR, b.MONTH, b.SENDER_ID, b.SENDER_NAME, to_char(u.SENDER_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SENDER_TIME, b.REMARK, b.CRE_NAME, b.CREATOR, to_char(b.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, b.DEL_FLAG, u.RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.IS_RPTED_FLAG, u.RPTOR_ID, u.RPTOR_NAME, u.RPTOR_TIME, u.STATE , b.STATE JOB_STATE, decode(u.STATE,'未填报',1,'撤销',1,2) DISADLED1, decode(u.STATE,'撤销',1,'未填报',1,2) DISADLED2, decode(u.STATE,'提交',1,2) DISADLED3 from ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN u left join ERP_ADVC_RPT_JOB b on u.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID = b.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID and b.DEL_FlAG=0 where 1=1
sqlMap.select: select count(0)cnt from ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN u, ERP_ADVC_RPT_JOB b where u.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID = b.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID and b.DEL_FlAG=0 and 1=1

select u.RPT_JOB_PRD_ID, u.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID, u.YEAR, u.MONTH, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.BRAND, u.PAR_PRD_NAME, j.ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID, j.ADVC_RPT_NUM, j.ADVC_RPT_AMOUNT, p.PRVD_PRICE, NVL(sto.STORE_NUM, 0) STORE_NUM, NVL(wayi.WAY_NUM, 0) WAY_NUM, NVL(re.NOTICE_NUM, 0) NOTICE_NUM, NVL(sj.ORDER_NUM, 0) LAST_ORDER_NUM, NVL(b.ADVC_RPT_NUM, 0) LAST_ADVC_RPT_NUM from ERP_RPT_JOB_PRD u left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID left join ERP_ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL b on u.PRD_ID = b.PRD_ID and b.YEAR = #YEAR# and b.MONTH = #LAST_MONTH# and b.CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# left join ERP_ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL j on u.PRD_ID = j.PRD_ID and j.RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID= #RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID# left join (select acct.PRD_ID, sum(NVL(acct.STORE_NUM,0))STORE_NUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT acct where acct.LEDGER_ID = #CHANN_ID# and acct.STORE_ID not like '%-RT' group by acct.PRD_ID) sto on sto.PRD_ID = u.PRD_ID left join (select d.PRD_ID, sum(NVL(d.ORDER_NUM, 0)) ORDER_NUM, sum(NVL(d.SENDED_NUM, 0)) SENDED_NUM, (sum(NVL(d.ORDER_NUM, 0)) - sum(NVL(d.SENDED_NUM, 0))) WAY_NUM from ERP_SALE_ORDER c, ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL d where c.SALE_ORDER_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_ID and c.ORDER_CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# and c.STATE in ('审核通过', '待发货', '已发货') and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 and d.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 group by d.PRD_ID) wayi on wayi.PRD_ID = u.PRD_ID left join (select t.PRD_ID, SUM(t.STOREOUT_NUM) NOTICE_NUM from ERP_STOREOUT s ,ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL t where s.STOREOUT_ID = t.storeout_id and s.BILL_TYPE = '正常销售' and s.STATE in ('已处理') and (to_char(s.STOREOUT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm') >= #BEGIN_DATE# and to_char(s.STOREOUT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm') <= #CUUR_DATE#) and s.DEL_FLAG = 0 and s.ORDER_CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# group by t.PRD_ID) re on re.PRD_ID = u.PRD_ID left join (select d.PRD_ID, sum(NVL(d.ORDER_NUM, 0)) ORDER_NUM from ERP_SALE_ORDER c, ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL d where c.SALE_ORDER_ID = d.SALE_ORDER_ID and c.ORDER_CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# and c.STATE in ('审核通过', '待发货', '已发货') and to_char(c.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') = #LAST_DATE# and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 and d.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 group by d.PRD_ID) sj on sj.PRD_ID = u.PRD_ID where u.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID = #ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID#
u.PRD_NO like '%'||#PRD_NO#||'%'
u.PRD_NAME like '%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%'
u.PRD_SPEC like '%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%'
order by PAR_PRD_NAME DESC,PRD_NAME DESC
sqlMap.update: update ERP_ADVC_RPT_JOB u set u.STATE=#STATE# where ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID = #ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID#
sqlMap.select: select u.RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.SENDER_ID, u.SENDER_NAME, u.YEAR, u.MONTH, to_char(u.SENDER_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')SENDER_TIME, u.STATE from ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN u where u.ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID=#ADVC_RPT_JOB_ID# and u.CHANN_ID=#CHANN_ID#

select u.RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.IS_RPTED_FLAG, u.RPTOR_ID, u.RPTOR_NAME, u.RPTOR_TIME, u.STATE, u.YEAR, u.MONTH from ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN u where u.RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID = #RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL( ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID, RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, YEAR, MONTH, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, BRAND, PAR_PRD_NAME, PRVD_PRICE, ADVC_RPT_NUM, ADVC_RPT_AMOUNT, SHIP_POINT_ID, SHIP_POINT_NAME, DEL_FLAG )values( #ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID#, #RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #YEAR#, #MONTH#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #BRAND#, #PAR_PRD_NAME#, #PRVD_PRICE#, #ADVC_RPT_NUM#, #ADVC_RPT_AMOUNT#, #SHIP_POINT_ID#, #SHIP_POINT_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.select: select u.ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID from ERP_ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL u where u.CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# and u.PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# and u.YEAR = #YEAR# AND u.MONTH = #MONTH#
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL
PRVD_PRICE = #PRVD_PRICE# ADVC_RPT_NUM = #ADVC_RPT_NUM# ADVC_RPT_AMOUNT = #ADVC_RPT_AMOUNT#
where ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID = #ADVC_RPT_CHANN_DTL_ID#
update ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN set STATE='已填报' where CHANN_ID=#CHANN_ID# and RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID = #RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID#
update ERP_RPT_JOB_CHANN set STATE=#STATE#, SUBMIT_ID=#SUBMIT_ID#, SUBMIT_NAME = #SUBMIT_NAME#, SUBMIT_TIME = sysdate where RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID = #RPT_JOB_CHANN_ID#
